secHeader: Follow these instructions to interact with Hugging Face models and datasets in this registry.

steps.header: Set up environment variables to connect to Artifact Registry:
For Hugging Face client version 0.19.0 and above, this timeout setting enables model resolution via pipelines and tokenizer libraries.

commands.value:
from huggingface_hub import snapshot_download
snapshot_download(
    repo_id="test-artifact", revision="v1.0.0", etag_timeout=86400
)

steps.header: Download a model from Artifact Registry:
With Hugging Face client version 0.19.0+ and HF_HUB_ETAG_TIMEOUT set, you can resolve models with transformers, diffusers, and other libraries.

commands.value:
from datasets import load_dataset
dataset = load_dataset("test-artifact")

steps.header: Artifact Registry supports resolving datasets using Hugging Face dataset libraries:

commands.value:
from huggingface_hub import snapshot_download
snapshot_download(
    repo_id="test-artifact", revision="v1.0.0", repo_type="dataset", etag_timeout=86400
)

steps.header: Or download an entire dataset repository using the snapshot_download API:
Note: Artifact Registry fully caches only datasets hosted directly on Hugging Face, not those referencing external sources.
